price: ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߞߊ߬ߣߌ߲ ߸ ߊ߲ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߘߎ߱ ߗߍߕߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߬ ߞߊ߲߬ ߡߐ߮، ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߟߋ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: إِنَّا نَحۡنُ نَرِثُ ٱلۡأَرۡضَ وَمَنۡ عَلَيۡهَا وَإِلَيۡنَا يُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: innā naḥnu narithu al-arḍa waman ʿalayhā wa-ilaynā yur'jaʿūna
